attributes.action: Increasing the length of summer holidays - Decreasing Half terms
attributes.additional_details:
1. More Summer holidays and not half-term holidays
2. flexibility to do holidays abroad much cheaper & nicer than the UK summer weather.
3. Half terms are expensive without quality family time
4. Modern world-changing is about time government to change the educational system as well
5. Keep schools in summer open/provide job opportunities/help employed people/See other countries - summer school opportunity
6. Quality family summertime instead of half terms
7. less half terms& more summer holiday
attributes.background: The Government needs to review the education system's school holidays as this no longer fits the modern working family, especially after Brexit and Covid19. I am asking to reduce half terms dates and increase summer holidays. The review should proceed with the view of increasing more summer holidays
